mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*,ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT num,title,price,content,remainCount,orgFileName,saveFileName,product_size,category,regdate FROM shop4
OR writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop4 (num,title,price,content,remainCount,orgFileName,saveFileName,fileSize,product_size,category, regdate) VALUES(shop4_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{price}, #{content}, #{remainCount}, #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize}, #{product_size},#{category}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
